import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-type' const Notification = ({ errorOccured, message }) => { if (message === null) return null const color = errorOccured ? 'red' : 'green' const style = { color: color, background: 'lightgrey', fontSize: 20, borderStyle: 'solid', borderRadius: 5, padding: 10, marginBottom: 10 } return (
{message}
) } export default Notification
